The  appellant,  being  a  Government  Servant  and  an  Excise  Guard
attached  to  the  Excise  Office  of  Tangalle,  solicited  a  bribe  of  Rs.
10,000/= from Siriwardana Pathiranage Lionel not to prosecute him for
having  White  Beedi  in  his  possession,  and  thereby  committed  an
offence punishable in terms of section 16(b) of the Bribery Act.
